ygData.subject: Skills
ygData.msgSnippet: My fav: when I discovered my 50 or so lock pick skill was enough to open the door at the hole.  I started spamming every rogue I knew.  Those guys sure know
ygData.messageBody:
My fav: when I discovered my 50 or so lock pick skill was enough to open the
door at the hole. I started spamming every rogue I knew. Those guys sure
know how to swear.

Anyway, I came out of lurking to ask: anyone know what lvl 60 bard title is?

Lastly, I canceled my account back in August, but still lurk as I enjoy
keeping track of people I have come to know/watching verant screw my class
of choice.

Just wanted to ring in my support for all those who choose to take the
picket lines with me.

Now just waiting for Dawn/Horizons/SB/etc. to come out.

Knaeve.
